title: Nerf shyv in TFT
body: Just a thought going out to Riot. You make a champion in TFT like shyv, and with a few items she becomes an absultely unstoppable beast. Seriously you cant leave her the eay she is and think oh yeah shes fine the way she is killing everything and turning into a ranged hero as well, it just seems that her attack scaling along wither everything else she gets when she transforms as a bit over the top in terms of her power especially when you get her to 3 stars.
